verses.text: \w And|strong="H6509"\w* there shall \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* \w rod|strong="H2415"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1503"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w root|strong="H8328"\w* \w of|strong="H1503"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*, \w and|strong="H6509"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* flower shall rise up \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1503"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* \w root|strong="H8328"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* filled \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* spirit \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* according \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* according \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w hearing|strong="H0241"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*.
